content: * ‍Assured Guaranty withdraws complaint against PREPA​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
name: Assured Guaranty Ltd
title: BRIEF-‍Assured Guaranty withdraws complaint against PREPA​

content: Oct 13 Bond insurer Assured Guaranty Ltd said on Friday it voluntarily withdrew its lawsuit against Puerto Rico Electric Power Authority (PREPA) over the failure to apply pledged revenue to the payment of bonds because of the utility's need to focus on restoring the power grid damaged by Hurricane Maria.
name: Assured Guaranty Ltd
title: Assured Guaranty withdraws PREPA lawsuit in Hurricane Maria aftermath

content: NEW YORK  Oct 7 Puerto Rico bond insurer Assured Guaranty Ltd said late on Friday it voluntarily withdrew a complaint that challenged the legality of the island's fiscal turnaround plan  citing the devastating impact of Hurricane Maria.
name: Assured Guaranty Ltd
title: Assured Guaranty pulls Puerto Rico lawsuit  cites hurricane

content: NEW YORK  Oct 4 Puerto Rico's benchmark general obligation bonds fell on Wednesday  hitting a record low  after U.S. President Donald Trump suggested late on Tuesday that the island's massive debt load will have to be wiped out because of devastation caused by Hurricane Maria.
name: Assured Guaranty Ltd
title: UPDATE 4-Puerto Rico benchmark bond drops to record low after Trump remark

content: NEW YORK The mayor of Hartford on Monday told bond investors that Connecticut's cash-strapped capital city has no room left to tax or cut its way out of its fiscal crisis  a bond holder said.
name: Assured Guaranty Ltd
title: Hartford mayor tells bondholders of dire fiscal status

content: NEW YORK  Sept 25 The mayor of Hartford on Monday told bond investors that Connecticut's cash-strapped capital city has no room left to tax or cut its way out of its fiscal crisis  a bond holder said.
name: Assured Guaranty Ltd
title: UPDATE 3-Hartford mayor tells bondholders of dire fiscal status

content: Sept 25 Securities insurer Assured Guaranty Ltd said on Monday it is willing to issue Hartford  the capital of Connecticut  a general obligation bond that could help the city avoid filing for bankruptcy.
name: Assured Guaranty Ltd
title: Assured Guaranty says ready to help Hartford city avoid bankruptcy

title: BRIEF-Assured Guaranty says discussed ways with Hartford to help ease city's financial issues

content: Puerto Rico's debt-laden power utility  PREPA  has a tentative agreement with its bond insurers on a restructuring of its debt  according to two sources familiar with negotiations  but the deal is not official and still needs approval by PREPA's board.
name: Assured Guaranty Ltd
title: Puerto Rico utility in tentative agreement to restructure debt -sources

content: SAN JUAN/NEW YORK  Dec 18 Puerto Rico's debt-laden power utility  PREPA  has a tentative agreement with its bond insurers on a restructuring of its debt  according to two sources familiar with negotiations  but the deal is not official and still needs approval by PREPA's board.
name: Assured Guaranty Ltd
title: UPDATE 2-Puerto Rico utility in tentative agreement to restructure debt -sources
